name: Jackie Chan
fighting_styles: Wing Chun, Hapkido, Drunken Fist, Tiger.

hongkongfilmwards: Best Film 1989 ''Rouge'' Best Action Choreography 1996 ''Rumble in the Bronx'' 1999 ''Who Am I?''  '''Professional Spirit Award''' 2004
